long_description: The Stohlquist DRIFTer PFD helps you make the most of your time on the water thanks to its comfortable fit. Durable Cordura(R) nylon shell stands up to the tough love of paddling. Gaia(R) PVC-free foam is soft, flexible and won't break down in a wet environment. Adjustable shoulder straps follow your movement without hindering it. Unique cross-chest cinch strap design eliminates annoying ride up. Hand-beveled foam lends a closer, more comfortable fit. Roomy, zippered pockets contain warm, soft fleece and a key keeper. Center-zip design with non-corroding zipper allows easy entry. 4-way lash tabs on front and back let you secure accessories such as strobes or knives (not included). Short length won't interfere with seat backs. Reflective accents of the Stohlquist DRIFTer PFD enhance visibility in low light.
short_description: The Stohlquist DRIFTer PFD helps you make the most of your time on the water thanks to its comfortable fit.
